  • ARTIST WORKS

    卡塞尔

  • ARTIST WORKS

    关于

只限本地人 Locals Only

此件作品实施于箭厂空间，这是一个由独立策展人和艺术家组织策划的艺术项目。该空间位于北京市中心的一条胡同里，原本是个小商铺。空间希望用这种特殊的展示方式为艺术家的创作提供一种新的可能性，顔磊经与空间负责人讨论，决定在项目实施期间交由胡同里的一个倒二手车的人随意使用，开幕当天顔磊邀请这个人和他的朋友，亲戚一干人等在一起吃了一顿涮羊肉。

The project was initiated for the Arrow Factory Space, a collaboration between independent curators and artists. The space was originally a small shop, located in a ‘hutong’ in the central area of Beijing. Wishing to propose new ways to utilise the space, for the duration of the exhibition, the artist gained consent for the project space to be let out to a local second-hand car dealer to use as he saw fit. At the opening the artist and the man invited family and friends to eat hot pot together at the space.
